title: Construction Zilean
body:
construction zilean

So I just don't like any of zil's skins so I thought of this one


q: instead of the bombs put a strap of dynamite and change the sound

w: not much you can do here but you could get him to do a sharp whistle and then say lunch break is over

e:when his speed is used on him you could have him say where's the loo. also when used on an enemy the ground just around there feet could look like wet cement

r: Instead of the hourglasses glowing around a character you cold have a hard hat on and zil could say something about safety first.



Alternatively why not pun zilean...I mean you wanna here a joke he has a zilean of 'em.

He even told someone they had no musical talent and they bard their fangs at him.



Might be weak skin ideas but I just don't like the current zilean skins

replies.body: I think the bloodmoon skin is like Ziggs arcanist skin, it doesnt match it (also barely any blood ive seen)
He is about to get a really cool bloodmoon skin! but i love this idea, especially the dynamite part! id buy it
